text: a way for face-on to harass you with spam message that are actually notification about thing that nobody care about like that one of your face-on friend downloaded messenger who care or someone is birthday unfortunately i had to instal because i am trying to cut down on the number of time a day when i check my phone and any application that force me to check my phone by pretending that i have a message when i do not is an application that will have to go now i will only check messenger on the computer occasionally via the face-on page before they started sending me b message it was my main way of communication with people in the u but now i am left with no way to communicate instantly since whatsit is not popular in the u u yet and i refuse to allow any application to spam me with unnecessary message
original_text: A way for Facebook to harass you with spam messages that are actually notifications about things that nobody cares about, like that one of your Facebook friends downloaded messenger (who cares??)  or someone's birthday.  Unfortunately, I had to uninstall because I am trying to cut down on the number of time a day when I check my phone, and any app that forces me to check my phone by pretending that I have a message when I don't is an app that will have to go.  Now I will only check Messenger on the computer occasionally via the Facebook page.  Before they started sending me BS messages, it was my main way of communications with people in the US, but now I am left with no way to communicate instantly since WhatsApp is not popular in the US yet and I refuse to allow any app to spam me with unnecessary messages.
